title: Who is going to be casting the All-Stars International Wild Card tournament in Melbourne?

Thanks for raising this.
Hoyts has some tech issue on the tickets but they shuold be able to fix that soon.
Keep an eye on this page: http://www.hoyts.com.au/movies/2015/league_of_legends_2015_international_wild_card_all-stars.aspx
